# Tumla - LLMs.txt

# About Tumla
Tumla is a student and alum led mobile-first platform connecting MBA communities from pre-admit to alumni. We work with business schools including INSEAD and ISB to create a coherent and innovation supportive ecosystem.

# Website Information
- Homepage: https://tumla.com
- Contact: info@tumla.com
- Feedback: feedback@tumla.com

# Key Pages
- Privacy Policy: https://tumla.com/privacy-policy/
- Cookie Policy: https://tumla.com/cookie-policy/
- Terms and Conditions: https://tumla.com/terms-and-conditions/

# Brand
- Name: Tumla
- Tagline: Less Noise, Better Connection
- Company: Tumla Ltd (UK company)

# Technology
- Platform: Static HTML/CSS website
- Hosting: Cloudflare Pages
- Font: Montserrat (Google Fonts)

# Content
This website provides information about Tumla's MBA community platform, including legal documentation (privacy policy, cookie policy, terms and conditions) and yearbook pages for specific MBA cohorts.
